articles.author: Mariya Knight,Sophie Tanno
articles.title: Putin blames Ukraine for lack of talks as African leaders press for peace - CNN
articles.description: African leaders pressed for peace in Ukraine as they met Vladimir Putin in St. Petersburg Saturday but the Russian leader blamed Kyiv for a lack of talks.
articles.content:
African leaders pressed for peace in Ukraine as they met Vladimir Putin in St. Petersburg Saturday but the Russian leader blamed Kyiv for a lack of talks.

articles.title: After Backing From US, France and China, India Sends Letter to G20 on African Union Membership - The Wire
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has “written to G20 counterparts to propose that the African Union be given full membership at the upcoming Delhi Summit of G20, as requested by them”.
articles.content: New Delhi: With calls for the African Unions full membership to the G20 getting rising momentum after backing from the US, France and China, India has also jumped into the fray with a letter circulat… [+3269 chars]

articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Ukraine war must be settled: South Africa's Ramaphosa tells Putin - India Today
articles.description: After his talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Saturday, South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa said, "This war must be settled... through negotiations and through diplomatic means," as he spoke about the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
articles.content: By Agence France-Presse: South Africa's president, in Russia as part of a delegation pushing for peace between Kyiv and Moscow, told his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin on Saturday that the fighti… [+5570 chars]
